summary: In New York City's Spanish Harlem, detectives Madigan and Bonaro are given 72 hours by their superior to capture a hoodlum wanted for homicide in Brooklyn.
cast: Richard Widmark|Henry Fonda|Inger Stevens|Harry Guardino|James Whitmore|Susan Clark|Michael Dunn|Steve Ihnat|Don Stroud|Sheree North|Warren Stevens|Raymond St. Jacques|Bert Freed|Harry Bellaver|Frank Marth|Lloyd Gough|Virginia Gregg|Henry Beckman|Richard O'Brien|Woodrow Parfrey|Robert Granere|Dallas Mitchell|Lloyd Haynes|Rita Lynn|Gloria Calomee|Ray Montgomery|Seth Allen|Robert Ball|Kay Turner|Albert Henderson|Toian Matchinga|Abel Fernandez|Paul Sorensen|Robert Biheller|Ollie O'Toole|Al Dunlap|Pepe Hern|Scott Hale|Sean Kennedy|Bob O'Connell|Conrad Bain|Ed Crowley|Tom Rosqui|Diane Sayer|Mina Martinez|Kathleen O'Malley|Elizabeth Fleming|Madeline Clive|Philippa Bevans|Nina Varela|Kate Harrington|Al Ruban|Lincoln Kilpatrick|Ralph Smiley|William Bramley|Ralph Brooks|Ed Haskett|John McLiam|Ernesto Molinari|James Nolan|Victor Romito|Hal Taggart
title: Brigada homicida
